etymology.description: 电(電) (diàn, "electric") + 动(動) (dòng, "move") + 车(車) (chē, "vehicle") = vehicle that moves using electricity
etymology.interpretation: This combination makes sense because 电(電) (diàn, "electric") refers to electricity, 动(動) (dòng, "move") indicates movement, and 车(車) (chē, "vehicle") denotes a form of transportation. Together, the word describes a vehicle that uses electricity to power its movement.

examples.chinese: 电动车是一种环保的交通工具(電動車是一種環保的交通工具)。
examples.pinyin: diàn dòng chē shì yī zhǒng huán bǎo de jiāo tōng gōng jù.
examples.english: Electric vehicles are an environmentally friendly means of transportation.

examples.chinese: 他昨天租了一辆电动车(他昨天租了一輛電動車)，在市区内自由穿行(在市區內自由穿行)。
examples.pinyin: tā zuótiān zū le yī liàng diàn dòng chē, zài shì qū nèi zì yóu chuān xíng.
examples.english: He rented an electric vehicle yesterday and freely maneuvered through the city.

examples.chinese: 很多人选择电动车作为环保出行方式(很多人選擇電動車作為環保出行方式)，以减少汽车尾气排放(以減少汽車尾氣排放)。
examples.pinyin: hěn duō rén xuǎn zé diàn dòng chē zuò wéi huán bǎo chū xíng fāng shì, yǐ jiǎn shǎo qì chē wěi qì pái fàng.
examples.english: Many people choose electric vehicles as an environmentally friendly travel mode in order to reduce car exhaust emissions.
